thread.section_title: Save On Energy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Save On Energy | www.saveonenergy.com
thread.title: Pat Walker
thread.title_full: Save On Energy reviewed by Pat Walker

author: Pat Walker
title: Pat Walker
text:
It was a very rewarding experience. Received email with utility numbers/companies to contact which I did. I will also be calling back to discuss internet/phone/tv services.
The only problem I am currently having is with Water Co. Have to present documents in person. Finally, they understood and my son will have to go in person to pay the fee and show documents. Bummer.
Too bad, service could not be done over phone.
